name: Monument Freeze Mode — Sustained Output Validation
description: Validates freeze mode behavior. Monument freeze holds the reverb buffer, producing sustained output. The second half of output should show stable energy (no unbounded growth). Freeze is parameter index 14.

capability_requirements.notes: Freeze mode hold behavior — sustained reverb buffer

reasonable_peak.description: Peak level should not exceed -0.3 dBFS

frozen_has_energy.description: Frozen reverb should sustain energy (hold mode)

no_energy_growth.description: Frozen output — measured 0% growth (tightened to 20% max)

pass_criteria: Freeze mode produces sustained output without unbounded energy growth
